content.rendered:
Directed by Nupur Asthana. Vishal Bhardwaj. Shonali Bose. Hansal Mehta. Dhruv Sehgal. Alankrita Shrivastava.

Written by John Belanger. Devika Bhagat. Devika Bhagat. Vishal Bhardwaj. Jyotsna Hariharan. Raghav Raj Kakker. Kashyap Kapoor. Nilesh Maniyar. Nilesh Maniyar. Nilesh Maniyar. Hansal Mehta. Nupur Pai. Nupur Pai. Ankur Pathak. Dhruv Sehgal. Dhruv Sehgal. Alankrita Shrivastava.

Cast  Fatima Sana Shaikh( Lalzari ) . Sarika Thakur( Dilbar ) . Yann Yann Yeo( Sui ) . Pratik Gandhi( Manzar Ali ) . Masaba Gupta( Saiba ) . Arshad Warsi( Daniel ) . Ritwik Bhowmik( Parth ) . Danesh Razvi( Kunal ) . Meiyang Chang( Ming ) . Ranveer Brar( Rajveer ) . Bhupendra Jadawat( Lutfi ) . Wamiqa Gabbi( Megha ) . Tanuja Samarth( Baai ) .Dilip Prabhavalkar . Naseeruddin Shah( Pappi Singh ) . Tannishtha Chatterjee( Rayman ) . Kashmira Irani( Rehana ) . Girija Oak( Kirti ) . Manasi Joshi Roy( Shaheen ) . Vikram Kochhar( Aakash ) . Talat Aziz( Shabbir ) . Lin Laishram( Avantika ) . Ghazal Rai( Safeena ) . Rushad Rana( Zohaib ) . Tanvika Parlikar( Sharmeen ) . Meherzan Mazda( Abdullah ) . Anurag Kashyap( Self ) . Mita Vashisht( Amal Ali ) . Ahsaas Channa( Siya ) . Prateik Babbar( Divik ) . Dolly Singh( Aashna ) . Deshna Dugad( Ananya ) . Rahul Vohra( Vijay Baijal ) . Imaaduddin Shah( Self ) . Tanvi Azmi( Nilofer ) . Navneet Nishan( Raj Puri ) . Shivam Khajuria( Jai Singh ) . Deepak Dutta( Cop ) . Aadar Malik( Suhas ) . Ajit Shidhaye( Iqbal Masood Khan ) . Rahoul( Rohan ) . Siddhant Karnick( Vikram ) . Flora Jacob( Daniel’s mother ) . Nazneen Madan( Reema ) . Nilofar Gesawat( Mrs. Shah ) . Yamin/epi Das( Seema Sanghvi ) . Pushtii Shakti( Alicia Martins ) . Uttam Halder( Security Gaurd ) . Narendra Khatri( Vendor ) . Vivek Tandon( Heroine’s Father ) . Archana Gore( Chorus singer 2 ) . Samir Zaidi( Director’s assistant ) . Shibesh Debnath( Teaseller ) . Abhay Datt Sharma( Dancer ) . Aanchal Takalkar( Municipal Officer 2 ) . Purnima Rathod( Reena ) . Yesha Harsora( Girl at bookstore ) . Gargi Datar( Young woman at VT ) . Tia Sebastian( Sanjana Munir ) . Puneet Raj Bhatia( Adnan ) . Dhaval Thakur( Sharib ) . Armaan Tahil( Hanif ) . Bhagya Bhanushali( Latika’s Son ) . Aashna Singh( Megha’s colleague ) . Dhruv Lohumi( Prabal Dasgupta ) . Gitanjali Dang( Graffiti artist ) . Gouri Bhuyan( Anchor ) . Deepti Rege( Chorus singer 3 ) . Param Mehta( Young Abdullah ) . Shahrukh Sadri( Mr. Shah ) . Abhiijeit Chitre( Constable ) . Aslam Khan( Watchman ) . Mai Yu Yang( Monica Aunty ) . Micky Singh( Hina ) . Shashank Kumar Prajapati( Security Gaurd ) . Jaideep Singh( Arun ) . Harmin/epder Singh Alag( Young Mustafa ) . Bhavin Hirani( Rahul Sinha ) . Archana Rangari( Municipal Officer 1 ) . Vikram Sakhalkar( Mustafa ) . Tarun Kapoor( Shamaas ) . Devendra Sapkale( Husband of young woman ) . Anuradha Chandan( Mrs. Patel ) . Samuel John Heaney( British Soldier 2 ) . Yug Mohonot( Young Hanif ) . Rick Mclane( British Soldier 1 ) . Ajay Mehra( Hamza ) . Neelam Sheth( Aasma ) . Geeta Thakker( Daniel’s Aunt ) . Christina Du Preez( British Woman ) . Samar Farooqui( Customer ) . Jitendra Babadas Tupe( Chorus singer 1 ) . Aadil Shaikh( Daniel’s cousin ) . Dipti Pranav Joshi( Lali’s neighbour ) . Mukta Walse( Maid ) . Salman Nafees Khan( Recordist ) . Sarthak Chogre( Flautist ) . Ishaan Tripathi( Young Manzu ) . Ida Yoana Ayman( Young Safeena ) . Tarannum Raees Sheikh( Young Rehana )

Producers Pallab Bhattacharya. John Carney. Dan Jones. Anoop Ram Kumar. Ishita Pritish Nandy. Pritish Nandy. Rangita Pritish Nandy. Satish Shelke.

Production Pritish Nandy Communications (PNC).

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 6

Status OnGoing (2022–)
